text: Celje () is the fourth-largest city in Slovenia. It is the largest city of the traditional region of Styria and the seat of the City Municipality of Celje. == Twin towns == Celje is twinned with: * Grevenbroich, Germany * Singen, Germany * Slavonski Brod, Croatia * Doboj, Bosnia and Herzegovina * Budva, Montenegro * Cherepovets, Russia * Ä†uprija, Serbia * Graz, Austria * Spittal an der Drau, Austria == References == == Other websites == * Category:Cities in Slovenia
title: Celje
